preview.html: In this article, we will learn about many different interpretive cases of the veil, so follow us on gptafser.com/ to learn more. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a single girl Seeing a new white veil in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her marriage to a righteous man, her heart is at peace. It was also said that the veil in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her purity, good reputation among people, and good morals. Dreaming of a long veil in an unmarried woman’s dream expresses her protection from enemies, bad friends, and love of lusts. See also: Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a married woman Seeing the veil in a married woman’s dream indicates her good behavior among people. Wrapping the veil in a married woman’s dream is evidence that the dreamer is raising her children in a healthy way. Seeing a long veil in a dream indicates the righteousness of religion, sincerity in worship, and closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream about a man and its meaning Seeing a man wearing the veil in a dream indicates his modesty, purity, and good reputation among people. Removing the veil in a man’s dream is a sign of the collapse of his worries, the end of his problems, and the beginning of something new in His life. Buying a veil in a man's dream represents his many good deeds and good intentions towards others. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug in a dream and its meaningThe meaning of seeing a veil in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretationSeeing a veil in a pregnant woman's dream indicates her protection and safety, God willing. Wrapping the veil around the head in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of the birth of a just and righteous son, God willing. Seeing a white and pink veil in a pregnant woman's dream indicates the birth of a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a veil in a dream for young men and its meaningWearing a veil in a young man's dream is a sign of the dreamer's secret marriage to a woman of low rank and status. Whoever sees a woman he does not know wearing a niqab in a dream, this is evidence of his purity, nobility and good origin. Seeing a dirty veil in a dream for young men indicates many sins, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Interpretation of seeing a niqab in a dream in detailInterpretation of seeing wearing a veil in a dream by Ibn ShaheenSeeing yourself wearing a veil in a dream generally indicates coverage, elevation and protection. Seeing yourself wearing a tight veil in a dream indicates a tight situation and lack of livelihood. As for the wide, loose veil in a dream, it symbolizes an abundance of food and abundance Money. Seeing someone wearing a veil in a dream means that you will hear a lot of happy news. And whoever wears a torn veil in her dream, this speaks a lot about people's symptoms and reputation. Interpretation of a dream about wrapping a veil in a dream by Sheikh Al-Nabulsi Seeing a veil in a dream indicates the beginning of new businesses and projects. It is also said that wrapping a veil in a dream is a sign of adherence to religion and modesty. Seeing a veil around the neck in a dream means that the dreamer carries confidence for someone. Whoever wraps a veil around his eyes in a dream is a sign of lowering the gaze and staying away from lusts. Wrapping the veil tightly in a dream

title: The 20 Most Important Interpretations of Missile Dreams by Senior Scientists

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a missile: Seeing a missile in a dream can afflict the dreamer with panic and fear and spread in his heart a feeling of anxiety for himself, his family, and those around him, and fear that something bad will happen to them. Interpretation of a dream about a missile: Seeing a missile in a dream means that the dreamer will hear happy and joyful news and the appearance of some good things in his life. As well as Dreaming of a missile in a dream is an indication of achieving goals and achieving the dreamer’s goal. The vision also indicates that the dreamer’s life will change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a missile by Ibn Sirin. A missile in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates that the dreamer is characterized by chivalry, and the vision also indicates success and gaining opportunities. New, whether for the dreamer’s practice or his life. Seeing a projectile in a dream is one of the promising visions that indicate the stability and reassurance that the dreamer enjoys in his life. The vision also shows the blessing of old age, recovery from diseases, kindness, and abundance of livelihood, where the fortuneteller comes. When the dreamer sees a missile bombing and destroying buildings, the dream is not good and shows that the dreamer is committing the transgressions, sins and bad things that he does. The dream also shows that the dreamer may fall into a crisis or get hurt. Interpretation of a dream about a missile for a single woman. If a girl sees a projectile in a dream and fights, then this dream It indicates the approach of her marriage to a person of high morals and high status. However, if she does not participate in the war, then the vision shows the many problems that I will face. When an unmarried girl sees a burning rocket in her dream, the vision is good and indicates the excellence and success that the girl will achieve in her work or Her studies if she is already studying. If the Virgin sees in a dream a shell falling on her house, the vision indicates that she will reach her goal and achieve her dreams. The dream also indicates that her life will change for the better, positive things will happen and the differences between her and her family will end. Interpretation of a dream about a shell falling in Home for unmarried womenIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream a missile falling on the house, then this vision indicates that there are some differences and disagreements between her and her family or the people in the house that she saw. When a virgin girl who has not yet been married sees a missile falling in a dream, then the vision indicates the approaching Her marriage, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a missile for a married woman: The missile in a woman’s dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that foretells her good fortune, and the vision may also foretell that she will become pregnant, God willing. If a married woman sees a burning missile in a dream, the vision indicates that she will be exposed to health complications. It also indicates that the dreamer is exposed to some crises and disagreements between her and her husband or in her life. When a married woman sees her life partner launching a missile, the vision foretells him to travel to another country because he will find a prestigious job. If a married woman sees herself riding a missile in a dream, the vision It is a sign of the brilliant success that she will achieve in all aspects of her life. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from missiles for a married woman: If a woman sees in a dream that she is escaping from missiles,

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of Dreams CryingCrying is a reaction resulting from emotional feelings toward a certain subject, whether happy or sad, and when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is crying intensely in a dream, he will naturally be shocked and have a desire. Let us learn the interpretation of this and the consequences that result from it, so in this article we take a look at the most important things that were said by those in charge, so follow us..! Interpretation of a dream about crying. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing the dreamer crying in a dream means sadness in the coming period and hearing unpleasant news. Also, seeing a dreamer crying in a dream out of fear of God symbolizes remorse for the sins committed in her life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he was crying without screaming, this will indicate near comfort and getting rid of worries and anxiety. If the lady sees in her dream that she Crying loudly and crying, this symbolizes the fall of many major misfortunes. If one sees in his dream that he is crying and lamenting over someone he knows is dead, this means major misfortunes that will befall his life. If a pregnant woman sees herself crying in a dream, this heralds her the upcoming date of birth. And it will be easy. If an unmarried girl sees herself crying in her dream, this gives her good news that she will achieve her goal after a long patience. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is crying, this symbolizes sadness over what she has achieved and her divorce from her husband. Interpretation of a dream about crying by Ibn Sirin confirms the sign Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, said that seeing the dreamer crying in his sleep means great joy and happiness knocking on his door. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is crying loudly, by screaming, then this symbolizes great sadness in the coming days. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that she is crying silently and without a sound, This means the end of worries and difficulties in her life. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is crying at the funeral, but without a sound, this means getting rid of the worries and problems that he suffers from. If the dreamer sees himself crying in a dream when reading the Holy Quran, this symbolizes soon relief and repentance from sins. The lady, if she sees in her vision that she is crying intensely with tears, this means great difficulties and disagreements that she will suffer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is crying without a sound and with tears in his eyes, this indicates the achievement of the goals and aspirations that he will strive to achieve. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she slapped him heavily on his face and cried, this means that she is suffering from accumulations and pressures in her life. Interpretation of a dream about crying for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is crying without crying, this means great joy and a stable life in which she is happy. And if you see in a dream that you are crying loudly and loudly, This symbolizes great misfortunes and problems that she will face. If a girl sees in her dream that she is crying in a house that she does not have, this means that she will soon marry someone who suits her or she will soon establish a romantic relationship. As for seeing the dreamer crying and screaming in a dream, this indicates that you are entering into a major dilemma. At that moment, if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is crying over something that happened to him

title: Interpretation of a dream about oil

preview.html: Dreams occupy the mind of many people, especially if this dream is not understood to be interpreted, so today we will explain the interpretation of dreams and visions of oil in a dream, because you may also be interested in knowing: The pillow in the dream is considered one of the strange dreams whose interpretation is not known to humans, whether it is good or bad. And you will know it in detail for an unmarried woman as well as for a man. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of dreams and visions of oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams and visions of oil in a dream. Ibn Sirin has a different interpretation of seeing oil because he sees it as a source of money and livelihood, especially if one sees it He paints his body with olive oil or dyes his hair, which is an indication that that person will get rid of anything. Illness that has afflicted the body, or if there are problems in his head, such as a constant headache, and it will go away - God willing - after this vision. Seeing olive oil in a dream is a sign of this person’s interest in religious matters and natural recipes from God Almighty, and evidence of the light of insight. If a person sees In his dream that he has a large amount of oil, this is a sign that he will have many male children. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dreamInterpretation of seeing oil in a dream for a manIf a man sees in his dream that he is married, he will have better skin than the good offspring that he will give birth to And his wife and they live in goodness and happiness. But if a married man sees that he is pouring olive oil, it means he will lose his money or something important in his life. Whoever sees oil in his dream while he eats it in food, this indicates that he is a good and distinguished person in that place. But if he sees that his clothes have it in it, this indicates that he is a good and distinguished person in that place. Oil stains in his dream, this is evidence that he will suffer some damage, but this damage can be removed from him with patience, because the oil stain is a difficult stain, but it will be removed. - Strong will. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing olive oil in a dream for a single woman. When a single girl sees olive oil in her dream, this is evidence that she is suffering from some pain or problems in her life. But if you see this oil falling on the ground, you will suffer. A great loss. Olive oil in a dream for an unmarried woman, if she gets it, is evidence that she will get married and live a stable life, and olive oil is evidence of her connection to a good man who has love and religion. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is cooking with olive oil or any other oil, this is a sign On ease and prosperity. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of olive oil in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking olive oil, this is evidence that she is in good health and in good health and that she has enough goodness, grace, and plenty of livelihood. But if A married woman sees that she uses large quantities of oil, then this is evidence of goodness and contentment in her life and a lot of money, but she must rationalize her consumption so that she always finds enough for her. If a married woman sees olive oil in many containers, this is evidence of calming the situation and relieving the anxiety that Surrounds

title: Interpretation of a dream about a shark

preview.html: Through this article from gptafser.com/, we will see what the shark contains in the dream world. A single woman seeing a shark in a dream is a sign of kindness and blessing. Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream for a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees a shark in a dream, this is good news for her about the blessing that will come in her life and that she will be fine, thanks to God. Also, if she sees a shark In her dream, this is a good sign that she will marry a man who has authority, and God knows best. Seeing the sea and sharks swimming in it is a sign of the abundance of money that she will obtain. She may see many sharks in a dream. This indicates that this girl has a lot of luck and will get You will get a lot of livelihood, God willing. Seeing sharks in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign that she will make a profit soon. Seeing a shark swimming in a dream is a sign that he will get a job or a job that will bring him a lot of money. And if she sees a fish A predatory or wild shark in her dream, this is not praiseworthy, because it symbolizes the presence of enemies. Attacking sharks in a dream can mean problems at work or problems that are not easy to deal with. And if a girl sees sharks attacking someone in a dream, this means that This person will undergo changes that are not positive. Catching sharks in a dream for a virgin girl. It may be a sign that she will get rid of sinners who want to harm her. If a shark swallows a human being in one dream, it may be an injustice befalling every individual from the sultan or the ruler of the state, and God The highest and most knowledgeable. Seeing an unmarried woman running away from sharks is good news that she has been threatened and will be freed from them, God willing. And if he sees someone being shaved by a shark, this is evidence of the calamity that befell him, and he escaped from it. Eating sharks in a dream is for unmarried women It is a sign that enemies will get their livelihood. See also: Fried fish in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees a shark in a dream, this is a sign of the happiness that this woman is experiencing. The appearance of a shark in the sea for a married woman indicates However, she will receive abundant blessings, thanks to God. Many sharks in a married woman’s dream indicate that she and her family will enter her life and she will enjoy abundant wealth. Seeing a shark inside the house is considered good news. Seeing a shark in a dream can be a good sign of a life full of bliss. And prosperity. Seeing a dead shark is considered ominous because it symbolizes that he will suffer from a lack of income, which he will represent, and God Almighty knows. But if he sees a shark attacking him in his dream, this means that he is suffering from marital problems that will be repeated with her. In the event that she escapes from the shark’s attack on her. Show Stability of things and life with her life partner after she suffered from tendencies was not easy. But if she saw one of her children in a dream and was attacked by a shark. This indicates his need for help and assistance, and he may need his mother’s care, and God knows best. It may be...

title: Interpretation of seeing everything in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn with us in detail the interpretation of seeing kohl in a dream for different situations. Previously, it was believed that dreams were nothing but visual situations that a person sees while sleeping at night, but they are not related to his reality. The Greek civilization came and was one of the first human civilizations that were interested in interpreting the connotations of dreams and knowing their meaning. They believed that dreams are divine messages sent by the gods at night to the human mind to deliver good news to him or to warn him of a close evil that might touch him. The ancient Islamic civilization also came to leave us a great legacy in interpreting dreams, as many Islamic scholars excelled in interpreting dreams and knowing their meaning, including Muhammad bin Sirin, author of the book (The Great Interpretation of Dreams), which we present to you today with an interpretation of seeing a kohl in a dream from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of seeing a kohl in a dream Kohl pen in a dream Muhammad bin Sirin explained in his interpretation of seeing coal in a dream that it is one of the things that carry many interpretations in its interpretation according to the condition in which the fortune teller saw it, but in general it indicates a desire to change circumstances. And obtaining food and kindness in the world. If one sees in a dream that he is taking a small amount of kohl, then he will obtain a small amount, and if he sees himself buying kohl, then this is a sign of his efforts to reform himself and his religious affairs. With the Lord of the Worlds. And whoever sees himself putting kohl on another person, God Almighty will give him great joy, and this person may be the reason for his appearance. And whoever sees in his dream that he is wiping colic from his eyes is exposed to crises, obsessions and serious sorrows in the coming period, and God knows best. A woman who sees a can of Coke in her dream is a sign that she helps others and always advises them to keep their money and not waste it. Kohl in a single dream Seeing kohl in a single dream is considered one of the commendable things that bring a girl very good news, as this vision shows the ease and prosperity of her life, whether in the field of study, work, or family and social life. When a single woman sees herself drawing kohl on her eyes, this is a good indication that her long-awaited desires and goals will be achieved. And when a single woman sees kohl in her dream, this means that she is a girl with a high degree of wisdom and rationality, which will help her choose the appropriate kohl in her life decisions. It is also the vision of an unmarried woman putting kohl on her eyes as evidence of her engagement or marriage to a person of morals and religion He will love her and she will love him and live with him a happy and long married life if God wills. Interpretation of a dream about kohl for a divorced woman When a divorced woman dreams that there is a man putting kohl on her eyes and she feels happy, this vision is a sign of her marriage to a righteous and pious man soon. And if a man puts kohl on the divorced woman and she feels sorry for that, this is a sign of her marriage to a man of bad morals and character, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. And when a divorced woman sees that she is drawing kohl on her eyes herself without anyone’s help, this is a praiseworthy vision indicating that she is enjoying

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold bracelet on the left hand of an unmarried woman

preview.html: But gold in a dream is not what some people think, and through the following lines we will show everything related to the vision of wearing a bracelet on the left hand, and for each case separately. Interpretation of a vision of an unmarried girl wearing a gold bracelet on her left hand. She wears a gold bracelet in a dream of an unmarried girl. It is a sign of... Her marriage is approaching if she is engaged, and her engagement if she has not been engaged before. But we have many interpretations about seeing wearing a gold bracelet on the right hand of an unmarried girl in a dream. It is a sign of goodness and success and can indicate good tidings in general. Whereas if a girl sees If the unmarried girl is wearing a gold bracelet on her left hand and was happy with it in the dream. The vision indicates success in work or study, if he is still studying. While if the unmarried girl is wearing a gold bracelet on her right hand in the dream. The vision may indicate good luck. Morality and good reputation. If an unmarried girl is going through some health crises and sees that she is wearing a golden bracelet on her right hand in a dream. She will recover from this disease and emerge safely from this crisis. We can conclude from this that seeing the golden bracelet worn by an unmarried girl is... Her left hand is a harbinger of marriage or engagement. See also: Seeing a lot of gold in a dream for a girl. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet on the left hand in a dream for a married woman. Wearing a gold bracelet in a dream for a married woman. Come and enjoy marital happiness and family stability. While seeing a broken gold bracelet on the hand of a woman Married in a dream. It indicates the presence of some marital problems, if it is worn on the left hand, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for wearing a gold bracelet on the right hand of a married woman in a dream, it shows interest in the home and can indicate staying away from problems, whether at home or at home. Work. If a married woman is going through some psychological crises or marital problems and sees that she is repairing a gold bracelet in a dream. Her problems will be solved without resorting to anyone. The dream of wearing a new gold bracelet that draws the attention of some people may refer to the dream of a married woman. However If A married man bought a gold bracelet in a dream. It is a sign that there will be some changes. This means that if a married man buys a gold bracelet for his wife and wears it in a dream. It is a sign of mutual kindness between the two people and stability. Or if a married man buys a gold bracelet and keeps it in Somewhere in a dream. It is an indication of his desire to reveal some of the secrets or pains that occupy his mind, but he is somewhat hesitant. Losing a golden bracelet for a married man in a dream. It is one of those dreams that indicates that some of the dreamer’s material problems will pass, and by God

preview.html: Through our topic today, we will learn together about many interpretive cases related to the appearance of engagement, so stay with us to learn more through the interpreter’s website, which is the largest dream interpretation site in the world.Interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream for one girlEngagement is a dream for every girl, especially if the matchmaker She is the person she loves, and seeing an engagement in a single girl’s dream is a reality. She may be engaged soon, and this is what was stated in the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin. It was also said that getting engaged in a single woman’s dream is a happy occasion for her. This means that seeing her in a dream is a symbol of events Positivity that will happen soon in the dreamer's life. Psychologists say that the repetition of the dream of engagement in the dream of a girl who has never been married. It is just desires and thoughts in the subconscious mind. If he sees a woman in her dream as if she is sitting alone at her engagement without a groom. It is a sign that Almighty God will fulfill Whatever he wants. Whoever cries over her engagement suffers severe distress, and her dream foretells that relief will come, and she must trust in God. See also: Interpretation of a dream about canceling an engagement. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream for a married woman. There is no doubt that seeing a married woman’s engagement in a dream is one of the strange dreams that It leaves the dreamer in a state of confusion. Al-Nabulsi says about the engagement of a married woman in a dream that it is goodness and sustenance that comes to her suddenly. May God bless her with the imminent pregnancy if she deserves it, and God knows best. Her husband’s engagement to the woman in a dream is considered one of the good visions that express the presence of affection and mercy between them. And whoever sees In her dream, her husband’s friend or one of his relatives has proposed to her. It is a sign that there will be a benefit for her husband through this person. But if she has girls of marriageable age, there may be confusion between her husband and this man, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself sitting sad At her engagement party, she is carrying a great worry that is disturbing her life. Whoever sees her engaged to someone other than a groom suffers from the husband’s lack of interest and her lack of self-control and understanding of her feelings, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing engagement in a married man’s dream means that he is approaching the fulfillment of his dreams and may He hears good news in the coming period. It has also been said that engagement represents a happy event for the engagement of the dreamer and his wife in the dream, because it is a sign of renewed love between them. Whoever sees his wife addressing him in a dream, she needs his attention and care. And whoever marries a woman he knows in a dream is a sign of his care. With her and his engagement to her. It is also said in the interpretation of this dream that he may soon hear good news about her. And whoever marries an old woman may lose something after making a great effort to obtain it. Whoever marries a married woman in a dream is constantly searching for things that are impossible to happen, and God knows best. Psychologists say that preoccupation with a man's dream is nothing but nostalgia for his former life and memories. The repetition of a dream about engagement in a man's dream expresses his romantic character and his love for attention and affection. If a man sees that a woman is proposing to him, this is good news that God will change his situation for the better and

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about a shark?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream There is no doubt that seeing a shark is one of the terrifying visions that leaves the soul with signs of strangeness and doubt, and this vision has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including that the shark may prey on someone or kill you. Attack. You can catch it or eat its meat and see it in your home or dive in the seas. What concerns us in this article is to review all the indications and cases related to the shark dream. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream of a shark? Interpretation of the shark dream Seeing a shark in a dream expresses a dangerous journey, anticipating and monitoring any danger that may threaten the dreamer's future and future plans, as well as the difficulty of living normally. Seeing a shark in a dream also indicates the crises that follow the visionary, whether in the living and practical aspect or the emotional and psychological aspect, and it is going through a period in which fluctuations abound. Seeing a shark also indicates the enemy who is lurking for you all the time and his goals are despicable, as he is based on achieving his interests and goals at the expense of your interests and goals, so there is no need to think. That his desires may affect the lives of others. Seeing a shark is an indication of great spoils and benefits, the battles that the dreamer has fought, the enormous challenges, the various ways and methods of earning a living, being exposed to many dangers, and overcoming them is an indication of many fruitful successes and achievements. Fish, in general, are good, abundant, a blessing, high profits, reaping from the goal and desire, going through periods of prosperity, high status and position, participating in discussions, and entering into disputes with others. Interpretation of a dream about a shark by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing fish indicates livelihood, advantages, blessings and rewards, dazzling successes, achieving goals and purposes, fulfilling needs, paying off debts, fulfilling promises, mastering craftsmanship, and sincerity in work, especially if one sees that he is chasing. If the dreamer sees a shark, this expresses serious financial crises, distress that prevents the completion of what he has recently planned, the difficulty of ending this critical situation and the difficulty of many interests. This vision also indicates the danger that Surrounded by all sides, imminent evils, troubles, entanglements and plots that are placed in his way to prevent him from achieving his goal and purpose. The shark symbolizes the persistent enemy whose sole interest is to spoil the lives of others and destroy their future plans and projects. If one sees that he is fighting a shark, this indicates a modification in the methods of coexistence, a tendency to confront and fight in battle instead of avoiding it or postponing it to another time and clinging to new survival strategies. If he sees that he has taken from the shark, this indicates mastery of his enemy and gaining great benefit and salvation from a difficult problem. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a single woman The shark in a single woman’s dream symbolizes the fears that surround him from all sides and anxiety about tomorrow and the unknown events it carries and waiting before taking any step and his steps and decisions are usually violent. This vision also expresses possession and

title: Frequent urination in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about urinating in the toilet by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Frequent urination in a dream: One of the amazing things that a dreamer can see in his dream is that he urinates a lot and is surprised by this dream. Indeed, there are many interpretations about this matter, and in our article we are interested in highlighting them for single women, both married and unmarried. Pregnant, so follow us. Frequent urination in a dream by Ibn Sirin Frequent urination in a dream Experts say that the interpretation of a dream about urinating a lot has different connotations, some of which are good, while others come to warn the dreamer of some of the actions he takes while awake. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that frequent urination is The dreamer's clothes are evidence of his frequent negligence in certain matters and his inability to find solutions to his problems. While the previous interpretation may differ slightly from the same vision, as it indicates the large amount that comes to the sleeper, but he spends it inappropriately and wastes it, and is therefore classified as inappropriately excessive. Desirable. A woman who frequently urinates in her bed can be a sign of relief and relief in the matter of pregnancy, especially for a woman who faces unpleasant things and many difficulties related to them. Experts expect that the man will be able to pay off the debts that he had in the previous days And seeing this dream and dispelling the many worries that complicated his life. Frequent urination in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer’s frequent urination in his clothes is evidence of the abundance of money he has, but he uses it in the wrong place, where he wastes it and does not care about it. In some interpretations of this dream, he explains It is evidence of family disputes that bind him or also his friends, which causes him constant exhaustion and anxiety. It proves that this vision is generally an indicator of grace and the large amount that a person receives, and if he sees someone urinating in front of him, it will help him in the coming days and it will be him. Something helped him. Ibn Sirin explains that a father who sees his daughter wet a lot in his dream should rush to marry her if she is engaged, because he hopes that she will continue her life and marry her fiancé, and God knows best. While the increase in urine and its arrival in the place surrounding the visions is an indication of The anxiety he feels and the turmoil that affects himself as a result of the multiple responsibilities around him. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Frequent urination in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about urination frequently for a single woman indicates indicators that vary depending on many things. If she is unable to control herself completely and finds herself urinating quickly, it can be said that she is reckless in some of her decisions. Which brings with it crises later, and she has to control her reactions and control them a lot. But if she is able to control urine in vision, this means her ability to control and control her problems and not leave things stuck, which causes her psychological harm. A lot of urine On the bed can be a happy sign of an early marriage if you are engaged
